value.title: Diversity, Equity, & Inclusion 101
value.excerpt: The content provided in these guides serve as a starting point for you to begin laying the foundations of your DEI learning. We highly encourage you to reach out to the office(s)/center(s) listed within each topic to find additional resources, facilitated training opportunities, and learning tools to further your education.

value.title: 21 Day Equity Challenge
value.excerpt: The 21-Day Equity Challenge is a powerful opportunity to develop a deeper understanding of how inequity and racism affect our lives and our community.
